questions.question:
A person starts from point A and walks 10m north, then turns right and walks 15m. He then turns right again and walks 10m, followed by a left turn to walk 5m.

How far is he from his starting position?

A is 15m east of B. C is 10m north of A. D is 5m west of C. E is 10m south of D.

Where is E with respect to B?

A traveler starts from town X, moves 30 km east, then turns south to travel 40 km. He then moves west for 30 km and finally moves north for 20 km.

What is the final distance between his starting and ending position?
A person walks 10m north, then 5m east, then 15m south. What is the final displacement?
A person starts at point A, walks 10m east, then turns 90° right and walks 5m, then turns 90° left and walks 10m. Where is he from the starting point?
